description: Centro Educativo Villa de Ángeles is pleased to offer free courses, accredited by the Instituto Nacional de Formación Técnico Profesional (INFOTEP), designed for adults and available during weekends. Among the options are the Pharmacy Assistant and Medical Sales Representative programs, among others.
moreInformation: To register, you can contact us via our WhatsApp at (849) 886-8485 or visit our office from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.
closing: We look forward to seeing you!
